originalText.text: Dr. Mimken was the BEST primary care physician I’ve ever had.  He was so empathetic, patient, & genuinely kind, & we had such a great patient-doctor relationship.  It’s so hard finding a good doctor these days, & I was lucky to have him.  I just found out he’s no longer at Mt. Sinai, which makes me incredibly sad!  I wish you well wherever you end up, Dr. M!

text.text: Dr. Mimken was the BEST primary care physician I’ve ever had.  He was so empathetic, patient, & genuinely kind, & we had such a great patient-doctor relationship.  It’s so hard finding a good doctor these days, & I was lucky to have him.  I just found out he’s no longer at Mt. Sinai, which makes me incredibly sad!  I wish you well wherever you end up, Dr. M!

originalText.text: The best doctor you will ever find. Period. He is the most knowledgeable, caring, professional, kind doctor of all time. He responds within a day, cares about getting you help outside of your appointment with him, follows up, sends resources, and just an amazing human. Don’t look anywhere else. He has the best bedside manner, and dedicates time to listening and helping. He won’t ever rush you or make you feel like you’re not a priority. He provides thorough explanations to everything, too.

originalText.text: Dr. Mimken is the best! He took time addressing all my concerns and had a wonderful bedside manner. I came into the appointment super anxious and left feeling reassured. 10/10 would recommend.

text.text: Dr. Mimken is the best! He took time addressing all my concerns and had a wonderful bedside manner. I came into the appointment super anxious and left feeling reassured. 10/10 would recommend.

originalText.text: Such a compassionate and caring doctor! A beautiful human being above all!

text.text: Such a compassionate and caring doctor! A beautiful human being above all!

originalText.text: Dr Mimken patiently listened and addressed all of my concerns. So glad I found him.
